caption: Relating to requiring a person to submit proof of citizenship to register to vote; creating criminal offenses.
summary: This bill requires proof of citizenship for voter registration in Texas. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all non-citizens including Chinese nationals by requiring documents like US passport, birth certificate, or citizenship papers to register to vote. Those without proper documentation can only vote in federal elections. Violations are punishable as state jail felonies. The attorney general will investigate registrants without citizenship proof.
translation: 该法案要求在德克萨斯州进行选民登记时必须提供公民身份证明。虽然并非专门针对中国移民，但它通过要求提供美国护照、出生证明或公民身份文件等来影响包括中国公民在内的所有非公民的投票登记。没有适当文件的人只能在联邦选举中投票。违规行为将被判处州立监狱重罪。司法部长将调查没有公民身份证明的登记者。
